title: My User Level isn't updated on the Boards... posting this to try fix it
body: I've been level 30 since last March or so, but here I'm not level 12 (can't reply). I'm hoping posting a thread will update it or something.

replies.body: Sometimes it takes a little push to make your boards level sync up with your actual summoner level. Once you posted here in H&S it forced that sync to happen, and you're showing as level 30 for me now ^_^
Edit: Actually, this is your first time on the boards. Give it a few minutes to have it sync Dox.
